GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, defaults to being sorted by date in descending order

GET /api/articles/:articles_id.description: serves an object of an article determined by article_id parameter

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:articles_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments posted to the article specified via article:id

POST /api/articles/:articles_id/comments.description: serves a new comment from the input of a new comment added to the database via user input data

comment.body: This is truly a mind-blowing experience
comment.author: butter_bridge

exampleRequest.body: This is truly a mind-blowing experience

PATCH /api/articles/:articles_id.description: serves an article with an updated vote countered determined by user input

DELETE /api/comments/:comments_id.description: removes a comment according to an id input by the user
